name: Li'l Taffer
description:
A procedurally generated stealth adventure! Developed in slightly more than 7 days for the 2022 7dfps and PROCJAM game jams.

  • Explore a vast manor!
  • Steal its treasures!
  • Put the "rogue" back in "roguelike"!
  • I really liked Thief as a kid, okay?
  • No zombies!
  • No but for real, heck the bonehoard.
